name: Pet Blast HD
description:
Tap cute pet cubes to collect them! The ultimate matching puzzle game!

* Easy to play, just tap pet cubes with 2 or more same color to collect them.
* Various powerful and helpful boosters.
* Challenge your friends on the leaderboard.

1000+levels are waiting for you! We'll update new levels every 2 weeks. Enjoy PET BLAST NOW!
